mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ebd_market (num, writer, title, salesType, salesStatus, imgpath, content, viewcnt, regdate) VALUES(ebd_market_seq.NEXTVAL, #{writer}, #{title}, #{salesType}, #{salesStatus}, #{imgpath}, #{content}, 0 , SYSDATE)
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT result1.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM (SELECT num, writer, title, salesType, salesStatus, imgpath, content, viewcnt, regdate FROM ebd_market
WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
WHERE writer LIKE '%'||#{writer}||'%'
ORDER BY num DESC) result1) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT NVL(MAX(ROWNUM), 0) FROM ebd_market
WHERE title LIKE '%'||#{title}||'%'
WHERE writer LIKE '%'||#{writer}||'%'
